title: Typophile Found Type Buttons
content:
[![Found ephemera buttons](http://web.archive.org/web/20140918051747im_/http:/farm2.static.flickr.com/1230/956953273_0b4d3c9359.jpg)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140918051747/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/joepemberton/956953273/ "Typophile Found Type Buttons")  
These Typophile buttons have been designed, used, discarded, found and now repurposed.   
  
Everyday information -- once carefully designed by some anonymous person -- passes through our hands. Without a thought it does its job and ends up in the trash, or left to carelessly flutter to the ground to be found and repurposed.  
  
Each button is of course unique. These are not scanned and printed. They are found, curated and lovingly composed in a circular frame.  
  
 [Read more after the bump...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140918051747/http:/typophile.com/node/35569/)

[![Everyday information passes through our hands,](http://web.archive.org/web/20140918051747im_/http:/farm2.static.flickr.com/1085/957744948_efc7bae3c8.jpg)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140918051747/http:/www.typophile.com/merchandise/ "Typophile Found Type Buttons")  
 [![Putting found type in new contexts...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140918051747im_/http:/farm2.static.flickr.com/1064/957742420_fff157de46.jpg)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140918051747/http:/www.typophile.com/merchandise/ "Typophile Found Type Buttons")  
 [![Wearable art / wearable leftovers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140918051747im_/http:/farm2.static.flickr.com/1030/957741260_a9877c0c80.jpg)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140918051747/http:/www.typophile.com/merchandise/ "Typophile Found Type Buttons")

Quantities are very limited. If we have some left over after TypeCon (or if we make more) we'll put up ordering information on the [Merchandise](http://web.archive.org/web/20140918051747/http:/www.typophile.com/merchandise/) area. All sales support our ability to provide a thriving Typophile.
author: Joe Pemberton
